Text: EOL Legal Privacy Statement Cc All Please be advised that EnronOnlines Legal Privacy Statement Section will be amended from Nov as follows Current text For European Union residents please note that Enron Europe Finance Trading Limited is authorized to carry on investment business in the United Kingdom by the UK Securities and Futures Authority SFA and has reviewed and approved the contents of this website for relevant regulatory purposes The services referred to in this website are intended only for commercial enterprises and not for private customers as defined by the rules of SFA Enron will not enter into transactions with persons who would be regarded as private customers under the rules of SFA For Belgian residents please note that pursuant to the Belgian law of July on Commercial Practices this website is to be considered as being advertising reclamepublicit New text For European Union residents please note that Enron Europe Finance Trading Limited is regulated in the United Kingdom by the Financial Services Authority FSA and has reviewed and approved the contents of this website for relevant regulatory purposes The services referred to in this website are intended only for commercial enterprises and not for private customers as defined by the rules of the FSA Enron will not enter into transactions with persons who would be regarded as private customers under the rules of the FSA For Belgian residents please note that pursuant to the Belgian law of July on Commercial Practices this website is to be considered as being advertising reclamepublicit These changes account for the fact that the UK regulatory body is changing from the Securities and Futures Authority SFA to the Financial Services Authority FSA This amendment to the Legal Privacy Statement has been approved by Ian Brungs and Jonathan Marsh in the UK and Mark Greenberg in the US For reference the entire Legal Privacy Statement can be viewed here docsmarketingGlobalNavigationLegalandPrivacy If you should have any questions please let me know Regards Jennifer
